name: Combat Veterans Motorcycle Association (CVMA)
description: Registered 501(c)(19) veterans' charity with mission of 'Vets helping Vets'. CVMA is an association of combat veterans from all branches of the United States Armed Forces who ride motorcycles as a hobby. Services include support for individual veterans, veteran care facilities, veteran organizations, and registered charities. CVMA sponsors and participates in veteran-related motorcycle charity events and donates to various veteran causes.
source: Verified from official CVMA website and multiple sources
notes: NOTE: The phone number (931) 206-4043 appears to be a personal contact number for Steven Couch in Clarksville, TN, not an official CVMA contact. CVMA operates through local chapters and the national organization. For official contact, visit the website or contact local chapters directly.
eligibility: Combat veterans, non-combat military veterans, and spouses
